name: dangerous driving behaviour
description: A road user involving reckless or unsafe driving behavior

name: accident
description: A decision involving a collision or crash between vehicles or other obstacles

name: traffic jam
description: A situation where traffic is congested and vehicles are moving slowly or not at all

name: disabled vehicle
description: A vehicle is blocking traffic

name: helpless person
description: A human in need of assistance

name: first responder ops
description: First responders operating in an area

name: Damaged trash bin
description: A trash bin is severely damaged

name: Illegal trash dumping
description: Trash was illegally dumped

name: Vegetation problem
description: Vegetation needs to be attended

name: Too many log message
description: An application is flooding log messages

name: Wrong data
description: An application is forwarding faulty data

name: Application compromised
description: An application has been successfully attacked

name: Stress level
description: A human collaborator experiences too high/low stress level

name: Application configuration not optimal
description: AI proposes more optimal configuration

name: Memory leak detected
description: An application suffers from a memory leak

name: Component too slow
description: An application handles traffic not within latency requirements

name: Intrusion Detected
description: An application component is compromised

name: Link will be down
description: A connection will probably fail

name: Application restart
description: Based on past behaviour an application needs to be restarted

name: Re-route traffic
description: Re-route IP traffic

name: Add computing resources to function
description: A virtualized network function needs more computation resources

name: Relocate function
description: A virtualized network function needs to be relocated

name: Similarity detected
description: An actual problem might be similar to past ones

name: Congestion predicted
description: Production will be affected by congestion

name: Maintenance necessary
description: A production component will need maintenance
